articles.author: Isaac Schultz
articles.title: First Image From This Week's Rare Double Flyby of Venus - Gizmodo
articles.description: The European-Japanese mission BepiColombo was one of two spacecraft to pass by the hot, toxic planet this week.
articles.content: The BepiColombo mission got this close-up image of the planet Venus as it passed by on August 10. The spacecraft was using Venus for a gravity assist on its way to its ultimate destination, Mercury. … [+1713 chars]
